snippet: The United Nations Children’s Fund (Unicef) estimated last month that 9,000 children had been recruited into armed forces or other groups to fight in the South Sudan conflict.
abstract: United Nations Children's Fund estimates that 9,000 children have been recruited into armed forces or other groups to fight in the South Sudan conflict; child advocates say practice, though illegal, is widespread.
